first_tick_commands: scoreboard objectives add Saiyan.XP dummy
scoreboard objectives add Saiyan.Level dummy
scoreboard objectives add Saiyan.SkillPoint dummy

zenkai.title: null
commands: execute as @s[tag=saiyan_cooldown] run execute if entity @s[tag=saiyan_cooldown] run scoreboard players add @s saiyan_cooldown 1
execute if score @s saiyan_cooldown matches 2400 run scoreboard players set @s saiyan_cooldown 1
execute if score @s saiyan_cooldown matches 1 run scoreboard players add @s zenkai 1
execute if entity @s[palladium.power=saiyan:saiyan] run execute as @a[scores={health=1..1}] run tag @s add saiyan_cooldown
execute if entity @s[palladium.power=saiyan:saiyan] run execute as @a[tag=saiyan,scores={health=2..}] run tag @s remove saiyan_cooldown
execute if score @s zenkai matches 17 run scoreboard players set @s zenkai 16

charge.title: Super Saiyan
first_tick_commands: effect give @s minecraft:slowness infinite 255 true
commands: execute at @p anchored feet run particle minecraft:campfire_cosy_smoke ~ ~0.2 ~ 0.5 0 0.5 0 10 force

remove_power.title: Base Form
commands: execute if entity @s[palladium.power=alienevo:prototype_omnitrix] run superpower remove saiyan:ape @s

force_base_cooldown.title: Base Form
first_tick_commands: tag @s add cooldown2
schedule function saiyan:cooldown 3s

advancement.title: Base Form
first_tick_commands: advancement grant @s only saiyan:golden_ape
